Human Space Program is a multi-genre space simulation game where the kerbal creates his or her own mini space program. The game was created in 20.11 by PLATOON, a game-making company from Mexiko.

In HSP, you have a small army of pink skinned aliens known as "Humans" and rocket parts at your disposal. The current game modes are Sandbox, Science and Space Race. In Sandbox, the kerbal has all the parts unlocked

and free to use, in Science you must "develop" parts in order to unlock them, and in Space Race, you play as either the "Soviets" or "Americans" and the objective is to beat the other to the Mun and beyond.

Features

- A full-fledged physics system, courtesy of the Harmony physics system V.5.
- Fly missions to the "Moon", "Mars", or explore the "Solar" system.
- Assemble massive international space stations in orbit.
- Full modding support-and a massive kommunity of modders.
- Build ships with multiple stages, and jettison parts away as they burn out.
- Advanced staging and "astronauts", train them, develop and improve parts.
- Space Race roleplaying mode
10/10 would play again

How about, instead of pulling a role reversal, we did this:

Klingon Space Program is a multi-genre space exploration game where the Kerbal can create their own massive scale space military. The game was created on stardate -311485.22038305417 by MILITIA, a marketing company from Mexikerb.

In KSP, you send out tall spiny-foreheaded creatures called "Klingons" into their star system, conquering it all the way. It comes in three game modes: Sandbox, Conquest, and Career. In Sandbox mode, all of the parts are ready and unlocked for you to use. In Conquest mode, you simply fly out and conquer all of the alien worlds, gaining fear in your enemies. In Career mode, you have to balance Bribery, Fear, and Technological Progress to conquer the galaxy!

Features:

\*A fully fledged physics and orbital motion system, forced from the Congolmeration Engine.

\*Fly Missions to Praxis, and other moons of the Klinzhai Star System.

\*Assemble massive war machines in orbit.

\*Full modding support with a massive coalition of modders.

\*Build ships with multiple stages, and crush those who stand beneath them.

\*Klingonauts, train them to be honourable warriors and improve the technological progress of the race.

\*Military conquest mode, where you can explore and conquer other star systems brutally.
